backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with storage mixins and types for subjects, chapters, categories, questions, and user statistics including comparison helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration module with mirrored backend types and a no-op run function that returns the old actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of key frontend components, hooks, pages, and architecture docs.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: High-level frontend architecture overview describing tech stack and directory structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark-mode variants for UI theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, loading tracking scripts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/index.ts: Type definition file declaring the shape of a user statistics object with bigint fields.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup defining all app routes, layout, and profile-setup gating logic using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGateC: Empty component file placeholder for the admin gate card.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth flow, loading states, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form card allowing users to enter and save their name using a profile-saving mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cani: Displays a timeout warning with retry, reload, and home navigation options when a canister takes too long to respond.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cont: Password form gating contributor mode with login and actor readiness checks, currently showing a placeholder error since backend support is unimplemented.
frontend/src/components/contributor/PdfI: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that catches errors and displays a global error screen while logging details.
UI screen showing a fatal error message with options to reload or return home, optionally displaying the error message.
Main layout wrapper providing navigation, authentication-aware menu items, responsive drawer, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePag: Wrapper component that constrains page width and applies mobile-friendly layout spacing.
frontend/src/components/practice/Questio: Grid of numbered buttons for navigating questions, highlighting current and answered items.
frontend/src/components/practice/YearSel: Dialog for selecting an exam year with scrollable options and a confirmation button.
frontend/src/config/liveDeployment.ts: Defines live deployment identifiers and provides validation helpers for checking name constraints.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeTimer.ts: Provides a timer hook with start, stop, reset, and elapsed time calculations in milliseconds, seconds, and microseconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to interact with backend actor methods for profiles, chapters, questions, stats, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines light/dark theme color variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for admin functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterCategorySelect: Displays categories for a selected chapter, counts questions, handles PYQ year selection, and navigates to practice pages.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterSelectPage.tsx: Lists chapters for a subject and navigates to the category selection page, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ContributorPage.tsx: Contributor interface for managing chapters and questions, handling permissions, timeouts, and admin tools.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen showing student mode, rankings, and contributor mode navigation with identity and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Practice session logic handling question retrieval, progress syncing, local storage fallback, timers, and answer tracking.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Displays overall and subject-specific leaderboards with ranking icons, user highlighting, and tab-based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows detailed test results including accuracy, timing, and question review, with login and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectSelectPage.tsx: Lets users choose a subject and navigates to chapter selection using styled cards for physics, chemistry, and biology.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Defines TypeScript types for practice sessions, local attempts, and per-question answer tracking.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfjsClient.ts: Empty placeholder file for PDF.js client utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfSolutionMappin: Empty placeholder file for PDF solution mapping utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfTextReconstruc: Empty placeholder file for PDF text reconstruction utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfToQuestions.ts: Empty placeholder file for converting PDFs into question objects.
frontend/src/utils/practiceProgressStora: Manages localStorage-based practice progress, including saving, loading, key generation, and clearing progress.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and pending feature requests related to question management and student view error fixes.
